summary: The clip captures a light-hearted moment during a rugby training session, where players are adjusting to the sunny conditions. A coach or teammate humorously advises Trey on how to position himself in the shade to avoid sunburn. The playful banter continues as they remind each other to wear their glasses, emphasizing the camaraderie among the players. This scene reflects the casual yet focused atmosphere typical of training, where fun and safety go hand in hand.
setting: An outdoor rugby training field, likely on a sunny day.
participants: Trey and other unnamed teammates or coaches.
key_moments: Trey's unique positioning in the shade.
The humorous reminder to wear glasses.
